description: Update a dataset to replace its schema with a new or existing one. For more information, see Replacing a dataset's schema.

parameters.name: datasetArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset that you want to update.

parameters.name: schemaArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the new schema you want use.

nested_items.name: datasetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset you updated.
